title: Sally Bowles Finds a Body
description: 'Finding Tristan's body was bad enough; that whoever murdered him chose to do so in my classroom was even worse.Not again, I thought.'Anyone could have killed Tristan, he was hated by the entire staff room. Sally should call the police, but with secrets she'd rather keep quiet and her Year 10 class banging on the door, hiding the body in a cupboard seemed like the only option.This turned out to be a bad idea. How will she get rid of the body? She can't leave it in the cupboard forever - it might start to smell.'There's something rotten in the school,' according to Sally's friend, Trish. Can Sally solve the mystery before the killer strikes again? And will she ever teach her Year 9s how to use the semi-colon
author: J.P. Foxall
